text: @realDonaldTrump They told you to stop making the law political.They are independent.Your arguements were weak. According, to the courts.Get Barr, your attorney to write it. Sad, America do not have an AG."Make America, America again." Constitution destroyed for 4 years #COVID19 #JUNETEENTH2020

entity.description: Juneteenth, the holiday commemorating the day that all enslaved people in the US learned they were free, is being celebrated this year with marches, music and more.
